author: Joaquín Simó
description: This delightful twist on the Brooklyn is the most Italian American of drinks.
name: Carroll Gardens
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
15 ml Punt E Mes or other full-bodied vermouth

recipeInstructions.text: STIR ingredients over ice and strain into a cocktail glass
Squeeze lemon twist over the drink, wipe the rim with the peel and discard
